title: Wout van Aert’s Classics Exit Sends Shockwaves Through Visma-Lease a Bike: ‘He Was in the Form of His Life’
content:
Matteo Jorgenson delivered a stunning Dwars door Vlaanderen victory but it was small consolation for the loss of the Flanders-Roubaix favorite to injury: 'This casts a major cloud over this win.'

Read the full article at Wout van Aert’s Classics Exit Sends Shockwaves Through Visma-Lease a Bike: ‘He Was in the Form of His Life’ on Velo.
author: ahood
